locutie.beschrijving: The sermon explains Paul's vision of 'full inclusion' in Romans 9-11, contrasting human failure (Rwanda, Republican Convention) with God's mercy. It uses the Syro-Phoenician woman and Rabbi Hertzberg as illustrations.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Corrects lectionary omissions and provides historical-theological context for 'justification of the ungodly'.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the nature of God's plan and the reality of human sin, with a late shift toward declaring the status of the hearer before the judgment seat.
voorbeelden: Paul declares that unbelief has a purpose.
God has consigned all men to disobedience.
There is therefore now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To strip the hearer of self-reliance and move them to trust in God's mercy (the 'Better Bet').
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Low. The Spirit is not explicitly mentioned as the agent of the word's efficacy.

voorbeelden: The Republican convention this week has been fascinating.
Paul is saying that we are all in the same situation.
The biblical view of humanity is bluntly realistic.
Look at your printed insert.
We need to let this sink in.
Listen to this.
I was deeply moved.
I confess to you that my personal bias is showing.
I admire the work of those who put our lectionary together.
God is working for the best.
He will exclude those things [that obstruct love].
God has mercy upon all.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Moderate. The promises are often stated as general theological truths (Assertives) rather than direct address (Commissives).

voorbeelden: There is therefore now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
God justifies.
Amen.
declaratieven.autoriteit: High at the conclusion, but relies heavily on quoting Scripture rather than the preacher's own mandate.

indicatoren: Extensive discussion of the Republican convention.
Long anecdotal section about Rabbi Hertzberg.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a theological and political lecture rather than a participant in a divine encounter.

missende_elementen: Direct promise to the specific congregation
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Delayed encounter; the 'event' only happens in the final three paragraphs.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Strong but late. The 'Toezegging' is largely a quote of Romans 8.
voorbeelden: God has mercy upon all—all of us.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Preacher's opinions and anecdotes (I have been preaching, I admire, I asked).

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Directing the reader to the text or general address (You can't tell, I am speaking to you Gentiles).

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Paul, God, Republicans, Jews, and Rwanda.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological principles (God is a better bet).

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: It avoids moralism (Directive), which is a strength.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from Assertive (human sin/God's nature) to Declarative (no condemnation).
voorbeelden: God has consigned all... that he may have mercy upon all—all of us.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The pattern is correct but the Assertive phase is disproportionately long.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Because God justifies, there is no condemnation.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is a high-quality theological lecture that culminates in a powerful evangelical promise, but spends too much time 'talking about' the context.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The biblical view of humanity is bluntly realistic.
sterke_punten.effect: Establishes the need for a performative word.

zwakke_punten.probleem: Distracts from the illocutionary force of the text.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It becomes an event in the final moments, but the first 80% is primarily informative.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher acts as a commentator for most of the text rather than a mandatory of the Word.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Implicitly, through the reading of Paul.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Weak until the end; the preacher acts more as an essayist.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Yes, in the final paragraph's use of Romans 8.
tekstueel_bewijs: In the day of judgment we will all be defenseless.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Reduce the 'is/was' of historical reporting; increase the 'I declare/He promises' of the present encounter.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: Paul is saying that we are all in the same situation.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Today, God places you in this same situation: you are under disobedience so that you may receive mercy.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from reporting Paul's intent to enacting God's judgment/mercy now.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried under political and personal anecdotes.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the promise of 'full inclusion' throughout the Rwanda and Republican examples.
voorbeeldzinnen: To you who feel excluded, Christ promises full inclusion.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use 'You' to implicate the hearer in the 'defenseless' category earlier.
voorbeeldzinnen: You are the one standing before the bar of judgment.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually good; the sermon avoids legalism.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Maintain the indicative focus but make it performative.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A brilliant intellectual piece that needs more 'blood and fire' in its illocutionary delivery to move from a lecture to a sacramental event.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT reveals that the preacher isn't just 'sending information' about inclusion, but is meant to 'effect' inclusion through the Word.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The power isn't in the clever Rwanda analogy, but in the Declarative 'No Condemnation'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT identifies that the sermon's 'event-character' is delayed by a surplus of Assertives regarding 1990s politics.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: God is a better bet than man.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a product of its time (1996), which explains the heavy focus on the Republican convention, but this contributes to the constative surplus.
